Html:
Hi, I am looking into this project but didn't found any documents which explains the details of the project and its design. Could anyone provide me links for that.
I am research student and wanted to contribute to this project.

Hi
No wonder you couldn't find any docs - there aren't any... sorry, that's how it is. Read my blog, read articles (links on project home page), go thru the code - it is not too hard to get the idea of project architecture directly from code. Contribution - welcome, especially if you're from research field - research in computer science/compilers? Many open areas, lots of things to do, especially for someone with theoretical expertise.
Roman
